cells.data:
set mapred.reduce.tasks=50;
insert overwrite table cpk.mlb_test_log_detail_for_test0825
partition (hour,model,station)
 select A.serial_number,test_result,test_start_time,version,line,machine,test_type,slot,items,'' as fail_location,hour,model,station
 from
     (select serial_number,test_result,test_start_time,version,line,machine,test_type,slot,items,hour,model,station
      from cpk.mlb_test_log_detail
      where model = 'D10' and
            station = 'FCT' and
            hour between '2016-08-10_00' and '2016-08-25_24' and
            upper(test_result) = 'PASS' and
            substr(line,7,3) not in ('CRB','CRT', 'TFB', 'RMA', 'RMT') and
            substr(line,1,6) not in ('L07-2F', 'D03-3F') and 
            upper(test_result) = 'PASS'
     ) A
 left join
     (SELECT distinct serial_number
      FROM cpk.mlb_rpc_stage
      WHERE day >= '2016-08-10' and
            namec = 'CRB Check In'
     ) B
 on A.serial_number = B.serial_number
 where B.serial_number is null;
